articles.title: Jailer box office collection day 24: Rajinikanth starrer witnesses 38% growth on fourth Saturday, emerges as second highest-grossing Tamil film - ETV Bharat
articles.description: Rajinikanth's Jailer witnessed 38% growth at the box office on day 24. The film which will soon have its OTT release, has emerged as the second highest-grossing Tamil dethroning Kamal Haasan's Vikram.
